            {
                "id": 2,
                "name": "Hiking",
                "deleted_at": null,
                "created_at": "2021-04-15T09:15:33.000000Z",
                "updated_at": "2021-04-15T09:15:33.000000Z",
                "products": [
                    {
                        "id": 14,
                        "name": "Terrex urban low\u2028 Hiking Shoes",
                        "price": 143,
                        "description": "Unpaved trails and mixed surfaces are easy\r\nwhen you have the traction and support you\r\nneed. Casual enough for the daily commute.",
                        "tags": null,
                        "categories_id": 2,
                        "deleted_at": null,
                        "created_at": "2021-05-04T18:37:22.000000Z",
                        "updated_at": "2021-05-04T18:59:49.000000Z"
                    },
                    {
                        "id": 15,
                        "name": "TERREX EASTRAIL HIKING SHOES",
                        "price": 54,
                        "description": "Built for a stable feel and confident traction\r\non wet, uneven terrain. Stack up the trail\r\nmiles in these lightweight hiking shoes",
                        "tags": null,
                        "categories_id": 2,
                        "deleted_at": null,
                        "created_at": "2021-05-04T18:38:04.000000Z",
                        "updated_at": "2021-05-04T19:10:09.000000Z"
                    },
                    {
                        "id": 16,
                        "name": "TERREX AX3 HIKING SHOES",
                        "price": 83,
                        "description": "GORE-TEX Upper Mesh and synthetic uppers\r\nwill encase each foot in durable comfort. \r\nContinental Rubber Outs",
                        "tags": null,
                        "categories_id": 2,
                        "deleted_at": null,
                        "created_at": "2021-05-04T18:38:29.000000Z",
                        "updated_at": "2021-05-04T19:14:10.000000Z"
                    },
                    {
                        "id": 17,
                        "name": "TERREX TRAILMAKER HIKING SHOES",
                        "price": 34,
                        "description": "The adidas Terrex Trailmaker Hiking Shoes\r\nblend responsive running-shoe design with\r\ntrail-shoe support.",
                        "tags": null,
                        "categories_id": 2,
                        "deleted_at": null,
                        "created_at": "2021-05-04T18:38:53.000000Z",
                        "updated_at": "2021-05-04T19:04:09.000000Z"
                    }
                ]
            },
            {
                "id": 3,
                "name": "Basketball",
                "deleted_at": null,
                "created_at": "2021-04-15T17:09:12.000000Z",
                "updated_at": "2021-04-15T17:09:12.000000Z",
                "products": [
                    {
                        "id": 10,
                        "name": "DAME 7 SHOES",
                        "price": 125,
                        "description": "Show up in big game style whether you're trying out for the team or challenging a friend to some one-on-one in the park.",
                        "tags": null,
                        "categories_id": 3,
                        "deleted_at": null,
                        "created_at": "2021-05-04T14:40:05.000000Z",
                        "updated_at": "2021-05-04T18:52:12.000000Z"
                    },
                    {
                        "id": 11,
                        "name": "Pro boots low shoes",
                        "price": 57,
                        "description": "The superlight midsole features an innovative\r\ndrop-in that provides outstanding energy \r\nreturn every time you plant.",
                        "tags": null,
                        "categories_id": 3,
                        "deleted_at": null,
                        "created_at": "2021-05-04T14:40:30.000000Z",
                        "updated_at": "2021-05-04T18:55:13.000000Z"
                    },
                    {
                        "id": 12,
                        "name": "D.O.N ISSUE 2.0\u2028Shoes",
                        "price": 111,
                        "description": "These signature shoes from Mitchell and\r\nadidas Basketball feature graphics that\r\nhighlight the young All-Star's style.",
                        "tags": null,
                        "categories_id": 3,
                        "deleted_at": null,
                        "created_at": "2021-05-04T18:35:31.000000Z",
                        "updated_at": "2021-05-04T18:56:00.000000Z"
                    },
                    {
                        "id": 13,
                        "name": "Harden Vol. 4 Shoes",
                        "price": 137,
                        "description": "Most guys are finished by late in the fourth\r\nquarter. That's when James Harden is just\r\ngetting started.",
                        "tags": null,
                        "categories_id": 3,
                        "deleted_at": null,
                        "created_at": "2021-05-04T18:36:51.000000Z",
                        "updated_at": "2021-05-04T18:56:57.000000Z"
                    }
                ]
            },
            {
                "id": 4,
                "name": "Training",
                "deleted_at": null,
                "created_at": "2021-04-15T17:12:34.000000Z",
                "updated_at": "2021-04-15T17:21:21.000000Z",
                "products": [
                    {
                        "id": 6,
                        "name": "LEGO® SPORT SHOES",
                        "price": 92,
                        "description": "These shoes keep kids comfortable through\r\nplaytime, whether that means running around\r\non building universes out of bricks.",
                        "tags": null,
                        "categories_id": 4,
                        "deleted_at": null,
                        "created_at": "2021-04-15T17:20:03.000000Z",
                        "updated_at": "2021-05-04T14:33:37.000000Z"
                    },
                    {
                        "id": 7,
                        "name": "Fortarun Running\u2028Shoes 2020",
                        "price": 34,
                        "description": "Whether they're headed to school, day care\r\nor the playground with friends, send them\r\nout in all-day foot support with these adidas.",
                        "tags": null,
                        "categories_id": 4,
                        "deleted_at": null,
                        "created_at": "2021-04-15T17:21:05.000000Z",
                        "updated_at": "2021-05-04T14:36:17.000000Z"
                    },
                    {
                        "id": 8,
                        "name": "Supernove Running\u2028Shoes",
                        "price": 83,
                        "description": "Two kinds of cushioning in the midsole give\r\nyou flexibility and responsiveness right where\r\nyou need them.",
                        "tags": null,
                        "categories_id": 4,
                        "deleted_at": null,
                        "created_at": "2021-04-15T17:22:10.000000Z",
                        "updated_at": "2021-05-04T14:37:14.000000Z"
                    },
                    {
                        "id": 9,
                        "name": "Faito Summer.RDY\u2028Tokyo Shoes",
                        "price": 76,
                        "description": "Whether you're running out the front door to\r\nlog a few miles or want to bring a running-\r\ninspired style statement to your everyday.",
                        "tags": null,
